pageProduct.name: OGX Extra Strength Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner 385ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

Hair has a life of it's own and OGX wants to make sure it's a full life. Each innovative salon quality formula is made with on-trend ingredients to help hair shine, move, curl up, hold tight - whatever sets its personality free. The collections are fun and the choices never end.

In the world of haircare, no other brand has hair looking, smelling, and feeling like this. OGX is WHAT HAIR WANTS

General Information

OGX Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner helps to repair, soften hair. This strengthening conditioner is infused with coconut oil to hydrate dry damaged hair, reviving splits ends and preventing hair breakage. Sulfate and paraben free conditioner.

OGX Damage Remedy+ Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner Extra Strength

Why You Want It... Discover silky, soft, island-girl hair with this creamy, decadent moisturising conditioner infused with Coconut Oil. It provides extra-powerful moisture!

Drench dry, damaged strands with the secret of Maui. This ultra-rich repairing blend with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract helps to repair, soften and revive strands. Discover silky, soft, island-girl hair.


  • Sulfate free sufactants, (sodium lauryl sulfate) SLS free

  • Hair strengthening conditioner with coconut oil, essence of tiare and vanilla bean extract

  • Not tested on animals

Size: 385mL

Shelf Life in Days: 1095 days

KEY FEATURES

• Extra Strength Damage Remedy
• Coconut Mircale Oil Conditioner
• Repair, Soften & Revive Strands


Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.

Ingredients

Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3,, Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-47, Benzophenone-4, Butyl Methoxydeibenzoylmethane, Cymbidium Glandiflorum (Orchid) Flower Extract, Euterpe Olaracea Fruit Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, CI 17200.

Directions

After shampooing, apply conditioner generously to hair, working through ends. Wait 3-5 minutes. Rinse hair thoroughly. For best results use in conjunction with other OGX products.
